geoQuery.query: WITH SELECTION AS (SELECT SELECTION_ID,ls.OBJ_ID,TYPE,BEGIN_KM,END_KM,g.KEY_VALUES FROM WEB50.LNK_SELECTION ls JOIN GIS_INTEGRATION50.GATE g ON g.OBJ_ID = ls.OBJ_ID WHERE SELECTION_GROUP_ID = :GROUP_ID AND g.KEY_FIELDS = 'ROUTE_ID'), geo_data AS ( SELECT s.SELECTION_ID ID ,s.TYPE ,c.X_COORD X ,c.Y_COORD Y ,r.SEQUENCE ,sp.MEASURE FROM selection s JOIN PODS.ROUTE r ON TO_CHAR(r.ROUTE_ID) = s.KEY_VALUES JOIN PODS.STATION_POINT sp ON sp.ROUTE_ID = r.ROUTE_ID JOIN PODS.COORDINATE c ON c.LOCATION_ID = sp.LOCATION_ID WHERE (s.BEGIN_KM IS NOT NULL AND sp.STATION BETWEEN s.BEGIN_KM AND s.END_KM) OR s.BEGIN_KM IS NULL) SELECT ID, X, Y, TYPE FROM geo_data ORDER BY ID, SEQUENCE, MEASURE

WITH selection AS (SELECT DISTINCT FIRST_VALUE(SELECTION_ID) OVER (PARTITION BY g.TABLE_NAME,g.KEY_FIELDS,g.OBJ_ID ORDER BY g.KEY_VALUES ) SELECTION_ID ,FIRST_VALUE(ls.OBJ_ID) OVER (PARTITION BY g.TABLE_NAME,g.KEY_FIELDS,g.OBJ_ID ORDER BY g.KEY_VALUES ) OBJ_ID ,FIRST_VALUE(TYPE) OVER (PARTITION BY g.TABLE_NAME,g.KEY_FIELDS,g.OBJ_ID ORDER BY g.KEY_VALUES ) "type" ,FIRST_VALUE(BEGIN_KM) OVER (PARTITION BY g.TABLE_NAME,g.KEY_FIELDS,g.OBJ_ID ORDER BY g.KEY_VALUES ) BEGIN_KM ,FIRST_VALUE(END_KM) OVER (PARTITION BY g.TABLE_NAME,g.KEY_FIELDS,g.OBJ_ID ORDER BY g.KEY_VALUES ) END_KM ,FIRST_VALUE(g.KEY_VALUES) OVER (PARTITION BY g.TABLE_NAME,g.KEY_FIELDS,g.OBJ_ID ORDER BY g.KEY_VALUES ) KEY_VALUES FROM WEB50.LNK_SELECTION ls JOIN GIS_INTEGRATION50.GATE g ON g.OBJ_ID = ls.OBJ_ID WHERE SELECTION_GROUP_ID = :GROUP_ID AND g.KEY_FIELDS = 'SITE_ID'), geo_data AS (SELECT s.SELECTION_ID ID ,s.TYPE ,p.PART_ID P_ID ,c.X_COORD X ,c.Y_COORD Y ,p.HOLE_FL ,v.SEQUENCE_NO FROM selection s JOIN PODS.SITE oe ON s.KEY_VALUES = TO_CHAR(oe.SITE_ID) JOIN PODS.PART p ON p.SHAPE_ID = oe.SHAPE_ID JOIN PODS.VERTEX v ON p.PART_ID = v.PART_ID JOIN pods.COORDINATE c ON c.LOCATION_ID = v.LOCATION_ID) SELECT ID,TYPE, P_ID, X, Y FROM geo_data ORDER BY ID, HOLE_FL, P_ID, SEQUENCE_NO

WITH selection AS (SELECT SELECTION_ID,ls.OBJ_ID,TYPE,BEGIN_KM,END_KM,g.KEY_VALUES FROM WEB50.LNK_SELECTION ls JOIN GIS_INTEGRATION50.GATE g ON g.OBJ_ID = ls.OBJ_ID WHERE SELECTION_GROUP_ID = :GROUP_ID AND g.KEY_FIELDS = 'OFFLINE_ID'), geo_data AS (SELECT s.SELECTION_ID ID ,s.TYPE ,p.PART_ID P_ID ,c.X_COORD X ,c.Y_COORD Y ,p.HOLE_FL ,v.SEQUENCE_NO FROM selection s JOIN PODS.OFFLINE_EVENT oe ON s.KEY_VALUES = TO_CHAR(oe.OFFLINE_ID) JOIN PODS.PART p ON p.SHAPE_ID = oe.SHAPE_ID JOIN PODS.VERTEX v ON p.PART_ID = v.PART_ID JOIN pods.COORDINATE c ON c.LOCATION_ID = v.LOCATION_ID) SELECT ID,TYPE, P_ID, X, Y FROM geo_data ORDER BY ID, HOLE_FL, P_ID, SEQUENCE_NO
